data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Nukufetau, Tuvalu.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nukufetau, Tuvalu
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 139 believers find a person of peace today among the 461 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 139 believers in Nukufetau that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 139 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Savave Village
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Savave Village, Nukufetau, Tuvalu.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Nukufetau, Tuvalu a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Nukufetau that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.section_summary:
the state of Nukufetau, Tuvalu has a population of 600.

We estimate Nukufetau has 139 people who might know Jesus, 454 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 7 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Over 1.15 percent of the people of Nukufetau are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!
